org.springframework.cloud.aws.messaging.core

Class QueueMessagingTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.messaging.core.AbstractMessageSendingTemplate<D>
      • org.springframework.cloud.aws.messaging.core.support.AbstractMessageChannelMessagingSendingTemplate<QueueMessageChannel>
        • org.springframework.cloud.aws.messaging.core.QueueMessagingTemplate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.messaging.core.DestinationResolvingMessageReceivingOperations<QueueMessageChannel>, org.springframework.messaging.core.DestinationResolvingMessageSendingOperations<QueueMessageChannel>, org.springframework.messaging.core.MessageReceivingOperations<QueueMessageChannel>, org.springframework.messaging.core.MessageSendingOperations<QueueMessageChannel>

    public class QueueMessagingTemplate
extends AbstractMessageChannelMessagingSendingTemplate<QueueMessageChannel>
implements org.springframework.messaging.core.DestinationResolvingMessageReceivingOperations<QueueMessageChannel>
    IMPORTANT: For the message conversion this class always tries to first use the StringMessageConverter as it fits the underlying message channel type. If a message converter is set through the constructor then it is added to a composite converter already containing the StringMessageConverter. If AbstractMessageSendingTemplate.setMessageConverter(MessageConverter) is used, then the CompositeMessageConverter containing the StringMessageConverter will not be used anymore and the String payloads are also going to be converted with the set converter.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Agim Emruli, Alain Sahli

      • QueueMessagingTemplate

        public QueueMessagingTemplate(com.amazonaws.services.sqs.AmazonSQSAsync amazonSqs,
                              org.springframework.cloud.aws.core.env.ResourceIdResolver resourceIdResolver,
                              org.springframework.messaging.converter.MessageConverter messageConverter)
        Initializes the messaging template by configuring the destination resolver as well as the message converter.
        Parameters:
        amazonSqs - The AmazonSQS client, cannot be null.
        resourceIdResolver - The ResourceIdResolver to be used for resolving logical queue names.
        messageConverter - A MessageConverter that is going to be added to the composite converter.
